mapper.select: select * from housedeal where aptName like concat('%', #{dong}, '%')
select * from housedeal where aptName like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%')

select hi.buildYear buildYear, hd.aptName aptName, hd.dealAmount dealAmount, hd.area area, hd.floor floor, hd.jibun jibun from housedeal hd inner join houseinfo hi on hd.code = hi.code and hd.aptName = hi.aptName where hi.dong = #{dong} and hi.aptName = #{aptName} order by dealAmount
